title: Embroidered Picture, ca. 1825
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery with paint on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in running, satin and stem stitches on a satin foundation
dimensions: Frame H x W x D: 41.9 x 29.2 cm (16 1/2 x 11 1/2 in.)
description: Two children, one holding a fan, with a dog in front of a Georgian building. Framed with an eglomisé mat and a gold frame.
